website_summaries.verdict: Durable futon chair that provides a basic foundation to add your own mattress or cushions to suit your style. Bare bones for complete customization.
pros: Stands out for its easy-to-assemble frame that provides plenty of support all across the body when sleeping
Extremely adjustable between lying and seated positions
cons: Lack of a built-in mattress or cushion means the seat isn’t a complete purchase

customer_reviews.title: The first component to a futon loveseat/bed
customer_reviews.text: The major downside to this frame is the involved assembly process, which took me about an hour. Be aware that your package will just contain fasteners and individual pieces of wood. That said, the instructions were clear and the wood is accurately cut and of good quality. You could match this with a twin XL Japanese-style futon mattress, but I found that a 4"-thick 38x74" trifold mattress did the trick just fine and folds more neatly for use as a chair. This type of mattress fits neatly inside a standard removable 41 x 85" XL twin futon cover. Frame, mattress and cover in the photo were all purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Delaurant

customer_reviews.title: Good concept for a spare room or office
customer_reviews.text: I have a small spare bedroom. This fit in there well and takes less space than a bed frame or sleeper sofa. When unfolded, I have a full size bed. As a bed, it does sit low to the ground though. I paired it with a tri-fold memory foam mattress, rather than a futon mattress. This pic is with the frame, tri-fold mattress, and a comforter thrown over and folded under the mattress with matching pillows. Great addition for a guest room. Might not be ideal for seniors due to it sitting so low to ground as a bed, but great for all other guests.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Wilson

customer_reviews.title: infestation of bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this twin size futon with poplar frame for guests to stay over in February. Had granddaughter stay over in July and she immediately felt something bite her. Removed bedding and mattress and found frame badly infested with bedbugs. Had purchased full futon frame from same company for my son in November of 2018 and he found bedbug infestation in that frame. Deeply disappointed and left with almost impossible mess to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline G. Gilbertson

customer_reviews.title: Nice convertable bed.
customer_reviews.text: It was really easy and kinda fun to put together and holds without glue. It goes from bed to chair very easily. The lounger legs do like to tuck in when you move the whole bed or adjust it. It can hold at least over 200 lbs easily. The bar spacing is a bit much though that would be the only thing I'd really like to improve. Also the wood did not set off my sensitive allergies even fresh out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love KD frames products
customer_reviews.text: Love KD frames products. I have put together several of KD products, the instructions are clear and pieces are well marked. I really like the lounger, as do my grandkids. I put a 10" futon on it and it is very comfortable. I would recommend at least an 8" mattress for comfort. It is tulip wood and needs adequate padding on the wood slats. USA made too!
customer_reviews.author: lilly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Don’t buy a metal frame!
customer_reviews.text: This frame is awesome! The popular wood is beautiful and makes for a very sturdy and versatile piece of furniture in fact I was planning on painting it until I seen it was popular so I used polyacrylic, a water based sealer that is simply to use and dries in minutes. The instructions were easy to follow and very simplistic. I’m very impressed with this unit and thinking about purchasing another one for my living room since this one is for my sons room and a great alternative to save space.
customer_reviews.author: Change iz Good

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, light, and maneuverable.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy once put together, this futon frame is very light and easy to move through tight spaces. The instructions were very clear and well written. DO take the time to read the instructions. If you miss a step or fail to align the pieces correctly, you will be in for a rough time. Overall, I am very pleased. Eat. Construction Time: 20-30 mins. I recommend using an electric screw gun because it makes life just a bit easier. Also, if you do need a hammer to tap in dowel rods, use a light rubber mallet because the wood is very soft and a regular claw hammer will leave noticeable indents.
customer_reviews.author: Champs McGee

customer_reviews.title: I would have returned it, but I took the ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have returned it, but I took the extra step to glue all the dowels. The slats are way too far apart, even with a thick tatami mat you can feel them through the futon. I'll have to make a three piece rigid underlayment to solve the problem and still utilize the articulation which greatly reduces its value and utility.
customer_reviews.author: Cory C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid frame. Clear instructions. Quality parts.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. We had a variable speed driver and a rubber mallet. No other tools were necessary. Under 2 hours for build. Directions were clear. Quality parts all around. Drill holes were perfect and all parts fit together as per directions. Started by sorting all pieces. Solid after construction. Versatile positions. My wife did full build while I watched football. All she said was, “here hold my beer”.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzdrummer

customer_reviews.title: Good Frame - Nice Family Project!
customer_reviews.text: It's definately a "family project" to put this thing together. Lots and lots of parts but it's really not hard to put together. Good instructions. Once assembled it's very study and easy to move around. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR MAN-CAVE
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Make sure you put scotch tape on the parts and then label them. It makes it easier to assemble otherwise it can be very confusing. Solid with two persons sitting on it. I might stain and seal it at some point but right now it's perfect for watching movies and then converting it into a bed for my kids' sleepovers.
customer_reviews.author: PomanFerrari

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Futon Frame!
customer_reviews.text: I know people say this futon frame is hard to assemble, it's fairly straightforward if you organize the parts in the beginning of assembly. My friend and I finished the project in about 4hrs. I got the Queen Size and it is true to description. I get compliments on this futon frame all the time! It is worth it to get a nicer futon mattress (I paired it with a double memory foam core gold bond futon) and it can double as a bed. I have it in the living room as my main couch and often use it for guests. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn P.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the queen size and queen size mattress for this however they sent me a full so now I gave a mattress that is constantly slipping off and doesn’t fit correctly. I didn’t notice until after I had already put together, and the mattress was already out of the packaging as it is a foam mattress and cannot be stuffed back into the shape it came back to switch for that either.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: I have a small guestroom and needed something that didn't take up a ton of room like a large bedframe but also didn't look like an ...
customer_reviews.text: I was rather impressed with this frame. I have a small guestroom and needed something that didn't take up a ton of room like a large bedframe but also didn't look like an uncomfortable futon couch. It embarrassingly took me three true blood episodes to put it together but it was simple enough.
customer_reviews.author: Azmat Bhatty

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap(er) -- It works
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived without any marks on the box. After sorting through the wood pieces, I found the final scalloped tilt-adjuster busted off on both pieces. I needed to sleep on the thing, so I used some Gorilla glue and wood screws to make it serviceable. The seating position is very comfortable for reading, computing, or surfing. The lowest upright is still to vertical to sleep. Conversion to a horizontal bed is simple, however, the I wish the front legs had a locking mechanism so they would not collapse when the frame is pushed forward from the rear. If you want a cheap frame and don't mind a few squeaks and flaws...this is the frame to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: V. Dean

customer_reviews.title: All Natural Sofa - Goes Perfect with All Cotton Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I love this frame. It's all natural wood, and it feels good both as a sofa and as a bed. I would definitely buy again. I have an all cotton mattress, so this is the closest to an organic, all natural sofa as I can get.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond K

customer_reviews.title: Strong.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice frame work and easily put together with our new futon mattress. We stained the wood and it looks amazing. The only thing that I wish was different is how it sits up. The lowest sitting position is almost at 90 degrees with mattress so its not very comfortable. We wish there was a better form to sitting up at a nicer angle to have it as a couch or lounger instead of only as a bed. It is a strong piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Corbetts

customer_reviews.title: laying on the dock
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever put a towel down on a dock near a lake you will know what this feels like to lay on. If you plan to use this frame for quests or anyone to sleep on you may not want to get this. It looks nice and I have it in my study as an extra bed if needed. I keep it as a chair and sit on it to read sometimes but when it is laid out as a bed the slats are spaced in such a way that it is pretty uncomfortable. I have an 8 inch thick futon on it currently. I wish I hadn't gotten it honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Priced better than any local futon frame provider. - Assembly instructions clear - Well designed - Easy to re-position from bed/seat/lounge Cons: - The actual color is much lighter than pictured; but nothing that a simple stain can't fix - The "lounge" legs slip away with a gentle push. Fixed with a few extra felt pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Eo

customer_reviews.title: Great frame at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it and its worth every dime. I have it set with a full size futon mattress I already owned. Came in a small box, initially I thought there was no way this could be in that tiny box but it was in, it was and also it was easy to assemble. My one gripe is that a hand full of holes didn't allign but it still seemed sturdy at the end result.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: great product...
customer_reviews.text: This frame was easier than I thought it would be to assemble...The instructions were clear... The quality is 5 star...I assembled it by myself, being a 70 yr. old female... I would rate this frame easy to assemble... I purchased the twin frame to use as a quest bed...I like the versatility & highly recommend this lounger/bed frame...
customer_reviews.author: Lainybugaroo

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pieces
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this. It isn’t as practical as I hoped but it is still pretty great. It can be a little difficult to switch modes with a mattress on it and the mattress will slide without a grip latticework. I often left it bed style but I enjoyed the couch mode. The lounge mode is comfy, too, just not as practical. Would probably buy something a little different next time. Nice wood, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Malimichi

customer_reviews.title: the front legs fold to easy and I have to make sure they wont fall ...
customer_reviews.text: I would prefer not to slouch in chair mode position! it needs legs to stand up straight while sitting! I wish it had legs under it so I could not arch my back as much! the front legs fold to easy and I have to make sure they wont fall while sleeping in sleep mode position! although it is a nice I like it sturdy strong and holds me. with a comfy cushion it makes a nice bed! not hard to put together! need about an hour or maybe two depending.
customer_reviews.author: Republican

customer_reviews.title: So unique.
customer_reviews.text: So simple to put together. I will admit, my first words would make a rapper blush, but then I got into it and EASY PEASY!!! Love it . Fits perfectly in our guest room. We got the queen size.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were pretty straightforward. There's two boards that look identical, but are different sizes, you want to use the longer one first then the shorter one. I learned the hard way. lol it's great quality for the price. You can stain whatever color you prefer. It is a little hard to place up and down, you have to make sure you're centered on the backside to prop up or push down
customer_reviews.author: shay s.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I've made lately; it's a great quality item for the price, the delivery was super fast too. It takes patience to put it together as it comes in pieces, but believe me it's worth it. I added a good futon mattress and my kids and I just love it. Would recommend to anyone looking for comfortable seating in any room, especially since it can be used as a bed as well.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Great futon frame
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as pictured. I loved how unique this was and it was a great price. I also like the flexibility of having 3 different positions to choose from. It is great quality, very durable, but a little hard to move or change positions (by yourself) without removing the mattress first.
customer_reviews.author: JHan

customer_reviews.title: Nice multi-position futon frame.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it a high rating, but it is in a corner of my house where it doesn't get used much, so if you are purchasing this to use frequently, you should read a different review. I had a little trouble with the assembly instructions, but figured it out in the end. The pieces are labeled well. I'm a small, middle-aged, female person and I assembled it by myself. I used an electric screwdriver, without which it would have been hard.
customer_reviews.author: TirelessInPgh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Brought for our spare room and it's gorgeous and unique. Love the flexibility to change it into many positions. It does need to be put together and comes with many pieces but my husband handled that. I brought the Milliard Tri Folding Mattress with Washable Cover - Queen (78 inches x 58 inches x 4 inches) to go with it and boy it feels like Heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Aziyah and Myrlande

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: this is an item you have to assemble and the pieces were NOT labeled. I am pretty handy so I measured the pieces and labeled them myself. While attempting to put it together the pre drilled holes did not fit any of the connectors. If you are willing to figure out how to put it together then this is the item for you. For me IT IS NOT!
customer_reviews.author: CARLENE

customer_reviews.title: KD Lounger
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together but cumbersome. I feel the spaces between the boards are a bit far apart, I cut some of the shipping box cardboard to add more support under the mattress. Also it's a bit heavy to maneuver alone. All and all it is what I wanted and didn't break the bank
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not as sturdy or "finished' as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I received this Tri-fold Futon Frame today,sooner than expected. It's not as sturdy or "finished' as I thought it would be. I would recommend getting the lesser priced one if you see it since it is most likely the same product. I won't send it back though. It's workable. Needs sanding, corners need work and could use a good varnish or paint. I feel I paid more than it's worth especially with the shipping cost.
customer_reviews.author: Bluegirl

customer_reviews.title: very easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Took about 30-45 minutes to assemble, very easy to follow instructions, no issues whatsoever. Lightweight yet durable. Rating it at 4 stars because maybe 2-3 wood ends had some splintering and wasn't as smooth as the rest of it, but we sanded it down and it works fine. Does not wobble, sturdy and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be gentle when hammering in wood bracers they’re not steel lol
customer_reviews.text: Great functionality and aesthetically appealing. Easy to use. It was really easy to set up. Anyone complaining about the complexity of construction should have ordered something else or hired someone to assemble. All I needed was a cordless screwdriver and something flat to gently ease in wooden bracers. 30 minutes later I was relaxing in my new found recliner and or bed. I only write reviews on products I’ve purchased and used. This was/is a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: noel Monge

customer_reviews.title: Nice frame.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived complete. All screws, slats and pegs were accounted for. Took about an hour to assemble, (there was 2 of us) and was not difficult. Once put together we moved it into place, placed the futon mattress on it and it was ready to be used. It is sturdy and does not wobble or creak when used.
customer_reviews.author: JacquieT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Perfect fit for my RV. LOVE the chaise lounge position and the use for An extra bed. Strong but light weight construction. Extremely pleased!
customer_reviews.author: RodneyG

customer_reviews.title: Know what furniture your looking before buying
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expected the bed frame wasn't easy to assemble. Plus it doesn't look that great from futon couch to bed...too much moving the bed frame and the mattress doesn't have any supports to stay on the frame once trying to turn it into a couch.
customer_reviews.author: jonnybravo

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow this futon is such high quality! The wood is flawless and manufactured with perfection. My 12 yr old granddaughter put it together in 2 hours with no problems or questions. Everything fit together perfectly. I’m amazed at the quality for the price. Also, the packaging was excellent. Clean, no peanuts or paper. Clean. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieD

customer_reviews.title: Quality product & easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived well-packed. The quality of the wood was good, all pieces were included plus a couple extra screws and dowels. The instructions were clear and the futon was easy to put together. I put it together on my own in about 2 hours (me: 40-something female DIYer). It's a great sized futon frame for a narrower space if you don't have enough room for a frame that's as wide as the length of the bed. Sturdy when set up as couch or bed.
customer_reviews.author: c stanley

customer_reviews.title: Think Before Buying
customer_reviews.text: The assembly for this product if very tedious and most of the screws did not go in. I had to use a special drill to get the screws in. It was not customer friendly to put together and I am not as pleased with this purchase as I thought. It is very bulky in nature and if reclining sits way to low to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is pretty simple, but is time-consuming
customer_reviews.text: Please note that this futon comes unassembled. Assembly is pretty simple, but is time-consuming. Finished product is sturdy and we are happy with our purchase. We are considering staining the frame later, but it really isn't necessary. Not much of it shows.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Thomas

customer_reviews.title: ) Although I love the product

The thing weighs a f%#k ton and I felt like i gave birth to twins by the time i got it up the damn stairs. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: drake

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my small guest room, fits and looks great. Easy to put together just separate pieces first. Easy to operate. I wish the legs were taller but I don't know if it would be as stable. I used a six inch memory foam mattress, tri fold, and I leave it in the lounge position.
customer_reviews.author: anita bartosh

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality - PASS

Terrible item. Too bad!

customer_reviews.title: This is more of a Outside Piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Well, I try to use it as an inside lounger; however in my opinion, it's perfect for outside. And unless you purchase a perfect mattress, it's not going to do you any good.
customer_reviews.author: VSBrown

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Frame
customer_reviews.text: Very nice frame. Sturdy, well made futon frame. I like the added section for the legs/foot rest. Bought for my 16 year old son's room and he thinks it's very comfortable. Clean lines.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Putting it together was a piece off cake. The package was packaged very well. All of the worden pieces looked good as well as all of the wooden pegs and holes lined up perfectly. The drawings in the instruction pamplet was very accurate. Thank you KD!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think much of it at first but fit left in my she cave and very comfortable. Easy to recline and or prop up to lounge... great purchase.... comfortable to sleep on too... adjust to full size bed.
customer_reviews.author: cookie j.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! Great Value! Well Done!!!
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged and with perfect instructions! It takes about one hour to put it together... but it is a great frame! We loved it! Great Value! Works better with a 4" Futon Mattress (If you are going to use it as a lounger) If you are buying it to use it mainly as a full time bed, then you can buy a 6" mattress. Overall... Worth every dime!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Well finished and everything fit together easily -- no splinters. Great design. Can be broken down easily for moving. So glad to find something like this made in USA. Went with a 6" foam mattress -- longer life means less flexibility, so you'll need more than just foam futon grips on frame to hold in place when folding up. Highly recommend securing a strap to lower back of frame.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great, Versitile Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my bed/couch since I have a studio. This is by far the best furniture I have ever bought. I considered both the bi-fold and the tri-fold, but definitely glad I went with tri-fold. It took me about an hour to put it together, but the directions were clear and no major equipment needing to assemble. The tri-fold "lounge" piece folds under... you just have to lift up the couch. If you are in my situation and need an all-in-one item, get this!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Saindon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Queen Frame
customer_reviews.text: Great Queen sized frame. Lies flat or up like a lounge chair. Very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Needs more labels for a faster construction process
customer_reviews.text: So this item would be so much better if the company making it would label all the wood pieces. It took longer then it should have due to me have to check over and over to make sure I have the correct piece as what's in the photo of the instructions. They only label a few of them with some simple easy to remove stickers. I would have gave it a 5 star if they would have just add the labels to all of them.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
